entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 11:55 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
